actions.name: AreaOnAreaOverlayer
actions.description: Superpone un área sobre otra área

parameter.title: AreaOnAreaOverlayer Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how area overlay analysis is performed

accumulationMode.title: Accumulation Mode
accumulationMode.description: Controls how attributes from input features are handled in output features

generateList.title: Generate List
generateList.description: Name of the list attribute to store source feature attributes

groupBy.title: Group By Attributes
groupBy.description: Optional attributes to group features by during overlay analysis

outputAttribute.title: Output Attribute
outputAttribute.description: Name of the attribute to store overlap count

tolerance.title: Tolerance
tolerance.description: Geometric tolerance. Vertices closer than this distance will be considered identical during the overlay operation.

actions.name: AttributeAggregator
actions.description: Agrupa las entidades según sus atributos

parameter.title: AttributeAggregator Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how features are grouped and aggregated based on attribute values

oneOf.title: Maximum Value
oneOf.description: Find the maximum value in the group

oneOf.title: Minimum Value
oneOf.description: Find the minimum value in the group

oneOf.title: Count Items
oneOf.description: Count the number of features in the group

actions.name: AttributeBulkArrayJoiner
actions.description: Une atributos de matriz en valores únicos

parameter.title: AttributeBulkArrayJoiner Parameters
parameter.description: Configure which array attributes to join into single values

ignoreAttributes.title: Attributes to Ignore
ignoreAttributes.description: List of attribute names to skip during array joining process

actions.name: AttributeConversionTable
actions.description: Transforma atributos de características usando tablas de búsqueda

dataset.title: Dataset URI
dataset.description: Path or URI to external conversion table file

format.title: Table Format
format.description: Format of the conversion table (CSV, TSV, or JSON)

inline.title: Inline Table Data
inline.description: Conversion table data provided directly as string content

rules.title: Conversion Rules
rules.description: List of rules defining how to map attributes using the conversion table

conversionTableKeys.title: Keys to match in conversion table

actions.name: AttributeDuplicateFilter
actions.description: Filtra las entidades con atributos duplicados

filterBy.title: Filter Attributes
filterBy.description: Attributes used to identify duplicate features - features with identical values for these attributes will be deduplicated

actions.name: AttributeFilePathInfoExtractor
actions.description: Extrae información de rutas de archivo a partir de atributos

attribute.title: Source Path Attribute
attribute.description: Attribute containing the file path to analyze for extracting file system information

actions.name: AttributeFlattener
actions.description: Aplanador para atributos anidados

attributes.title: Attributes to Flatten
attributes.description: Map/object attributes that should be flattened - their nested properties will become top-level attributes

actions.name: AttributeManager
actions.description: Gestiona atributos

operations.title: Attribute Operations
operations.description: List of operations to perform on feature attributes (create, convert, rename, remove)

value.title: Value
value.description: Value to use for the operation

actions.name: AttributeMapper
actions.description: Asigna atributos

mappers.title: Attribute Mappers
mappers.description: List of mapping rules to transform attributes using expressions or value copying

valueAttribute.title: Attribute name to get value from

actions.name: BoundaryExtractor
actions.description: Extracts the boundary of geometries. For solids/meshes returns bounding surfaces, for surfaces returns boundary edges, for closed surfaces returns empty geometry

parameter.title: BoundaryExtractor Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for extracting boundaries from geometries.

exteriorOnly.description: Whether to extract only exterior boundaries (ignoring holes) for polygons (default: false)

keepEmptyBoundaries.description: Whether to keep features with empty boundaries (default: false)

actions.name: BoundsExtractor
actions.description: Extractor de límites

xmax.title: Maximum X Attribute
xmax.description: Attribute name for storing the maximum X coordinate (defaults to "xmax")

xmin.title: Minimum X Attribute
xmin.description: Attribute name for storing the minimum X coordinate (defaults to "xmin")

ymax.title: Maximum Y Attribute
ymax.description: Attribute name for storing the maximum Y coordinate (defaults to "ymax")

ymin.title: Minimum Y Attribute
ymin.description: Attribute name for storing the minimum Y coordinate (defaults to "ymin")

zmax.title: Maximum Z Attribute
zmax.description: Attribute name for storing the maximum Z coordinate (defaults to "zmax")

zmin.title: Minimum Z Attribute
zmin.description: Attribute name for storing the minimum Z coordinate (defaults to "zmin")

actions.name: Bufferer
actions.description: Crea un búfer alrededor de una geometría

parameter.title: Bufferer Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how to create buffers around input geometries

bufferType.title: Buffer Type
bufferType.description: The type of buffer to create around the input geometry

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: The distance to extend the buffer from the original geometry (in coordinate units)

interpolationAngle.title: Interpolation Angle
interpolationAngle.description: The angle in degrees used for curve interpolation when creating rounded corners

oneOf.title: 2D Area Buffer
oneOf.description: Creates a 2D polygon buffer around the input geometry

actions.name: BulkAttributeRenamer
actions.description: Cambia el nombre de atributos añadiendo/eliminando prefijos o sufijos, o reemplazando texto

parameter.title: BulkAttributeRenamer Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how to rename feature attributes in bulk operations

renameAction.title: Rename Operation
renameAction.description: The type of renaming operation to perform on the attribute names

renameType.title: Which Attributes to Rename
renameType.description: Choose whether to rename all attributes or only selected ones

renameValue.title: Text Value
renameValue.description: The text to add as prefix/suffix, remove, or use as replacement

selectedAttributes.title: Selected Attribute Names
selectedAttributes.description: List of specific attribute names to rename (required when "Selected Attributes" is chosen)

textToFind.title: Text Pattern to Find
textToFind.description: Regular expression pattern to match when using "Replace Text" operation

oneOf.title: Add Prefix
oneOf.description: Add text to the beginning of attribute names

oneOf.title: Add Suffix
oneOf.description: Add text to the end of attribute names

oneOf.title: Remove Prefix
oneOf.description: Remove text from the beginning of attribute names

oneOf.title: Remove Suffix
oneOf.description: Remove text from the end of attribute names

oneOf.title: Replace Text
oneOf.description: Find and replace text using regular expressions

oneOf.title: All Attributes
oneOf.description: Rename all attributes in the feature

oneOf.title: Selected Attributes
oneOf.description: Rename only specific attributes listed below

actions.name: CSGBuilder
actions.description: Constructs a Consecutive Solid Geometry (CSG) representation from a pair (Left, Right) of solid geometries. It detects union, intersection, difference (Left - Right). It however does not compute the resulting geometry, but outputs the CSG tree structure. To evaluate the CSG tree into a solid geometry, use CSGEvaluator.

parameter.title: CSG Builder Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how the CSG builder pairs features from left and right ports

createList.title: Create List
createList.description: When enabled, creates a list of attribute values from both children (left and right)

listAttributeName.title: List Attribute Name
listAttributeName.description: Name of the attribute to create the list from (required when create_list is true)

pairIdAttribute.title: Pair ID Attribute
pairIdAttribute.description: Expression to evaluate the pair ID used to match features from left and right ports

actions.name: CSGEvaluator
actions.description: Evaluates a Constructive Solid Geometry (CSG) tree to produce a solid geometry. Takes a CSG representation and computes the resulting mesh from the boolean operations.

actions.name: CenterPointReplacer
actions.description: Reemplaza la geometría de la entidad con un punto que esté en el centro de su caja delimitadora, en su centro de masa o dentro de su área.

actions.name: Cesium3DTilesWriter
actions.description: Escribe las entidades en un archivo

attachTexture.title: Attach Textures
attachTexture.description: Whether to include texture information in the generated tiles

compressOutput.title: Compressed Output Path
compressOutput.description: Optional path for compressed archive output

dracoCompression.title: Draco Compression
dracoCompression.description: Use draco compression. Defaults to true.

maxZoom.title: Maximum Zoom Level
maxZoom.description: Maximum zoom level for tile generation (0-24)

minZoom.title: Minimum Zoom Level
minZoom.description: Minimum zoom level for tile generation (0-24)

output.title: Output Path
output.description: Directory path where the 3D tiles will be written

skipUnderscorePrefix.title: Skip underscore prefix
skipUnderscorePrefix.description: Whether to skip the underscore prefix in the generated tile names

actions.name: CityGmlReader
actions.description: Reads 3D city models from CityGML files.

parameter.title: CityGmlReader Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for reading CityGML files as 3D city models.

dataset.title: File Path
dataset.description: Expression that returns the path to the input file (e.g., "data.csv" or variable reference)

inline.title: Inline Content
inline.description: Expression that returns the file content as text instead of reading from a file path

actions.name: Clipper
actions.description: Divide las entidades candidatas utilizando entidades recortadoras, de modo que las partes dentro o fuera de las recortadoras se produzcan por separado

actions.name: ClosedCurveFilter
actions.description: Comprueba si las curvas forman bucles cerrados

actions.name: ConvexHullAccumulator
actions.description: Crear envolventes convexas

groupBy.title: Group By Attributes
groupBy.description: Attributes used to group features before creating convex hulls - each group gets its own hull

actions.name: CsvReader
actions.description: Lee características de un archivo CSV

parameter.title: CsvReader Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how CSV and TSV files are processed and read

dataset.title: File Path
dataset.description: Expression that returns the path to the input file (e.g., "data.csv" or variable reference)

format.title: File Format
format.description: Choose the delimiter format for the input file

geometry.title: Geometry Configuration
geometry.description: Optional configuration for parsing geometry from CSV columns

inline.title: Inline Content
inline.description: Expression that returns the file content as text instead of reading from a file path

offset.title: Header Row Offset
offset.description: Skip this many rows from the beginning to find the header row (0 = first row is header)

oneOf.title: CSV (Comma-Separated Values)
oneOf.description: File with comma-separated values

oneOf.title: TSV (Tab-Separated Values)
oneOf.description: File with tab-separated values

GeometryConfig.title: Geometry Configuration
GeometryConfig.description: Configure how geometry data is extracted from CSV columns

oneOf.title: WKT Column
oneOf.description: Geometry stored as Well-Known Text in a single column

column.title: WKT Column Name
column.description: Name of the column containing WKT geometry

oneOf.title: Coordinate Columns
oneOf.description: Geometry stored as separate X, Y, (optional Z) columns

xColumn.title: X Column Name
xColumn.description: Name of the column containing X coordinate (longitude)

yColumn.title: Y Column Name
yColumn.description: Name of the column containing Y coordinate (latitude)

zColumn.title: Z Column Name
zColumn.description: Optional name of the column containing Z coordinate (elevation)

epsg.title: EPSG Code
epsg.description: Coordinate Reference System code (e.g., 4326 for WGS84)

actions.name: CsvWriter
actions.description: Writes features to CSV or TSV files.

parameter.title: CsvWriter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for writing features to CSV/TSV files.

geometry.title: Geometry Configuration
geometry.description: Optional configuration for exporting geometry to CSV columns

output.description: Output path or expression for the CSV/TSV file to create

oneOf.title: CSV (Comma-Separated Values)
oneOf.description: File with comma-separated values

oneOf.title: TSV (Tab-Separated Values)
oneOf.description: File with tab-separated values

GeometryExportConfig.title: Geometry Export Configuration
GeometryExportConfig.description: Configure how geometry data is written to CSV columns

oneOf.title: WKT Column
oneOf.description: Write geometry as Well-Known Text in a single column

column.title: WKT Column Name
column.description: Name of the column to write WKT geometry

oneOf.title: Coordinate Columns
oneOf.description:
Write geometry as separate X, Y, (optional Z) columns
Note: Only supports Point geometries. Non-point geometries will be skipped with a warning.

xColumn.title: X Column Name
xColumn.description: Name of the column for X coordinate (longitude)

yColumn.title: Y Column Name
yColumn.description: Name of the column for Y coordinate (latitude)

zColumn.title: Z Column Name
zColumn.description: Optional name of the column for Z coordinate (elevation)

actions.name: CzmlReader
actions.description: Lee características geográficas de archivos CZML (Lenguaje Cesium) para visualización 3D

parameter.title: CzmlReader Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for reading CZML files as geographic features.

dataset.title: File Path
dataset.description: Expression that returns the path to the input file (e.g., "data.csv" or variable reference)

force2d.title: Force 2D
force2d.description: If true, forces all geometries to be 2D (ignoring Z values)

inline.title: Inline Content
inline.description: Expression that returns the file content as text instead of reading from a file path

skipDocumentPacket.title: Skip Document Packet
skipDocumentPacket.description: If true, skips the document packet (first packet with version/clock info)

actions.name: CzmlWriter
actions.description: Escribe características a un archivo CZML

groupBy.title: Group By Attributes
groupBy.description: Attributes used to group features into separate CZML files

output.title: Output File Path
output.description: Path where the CZML file will be written

actions.name: DimensionFilter
actions.description: Filtra las entidades según su dimensión

actions.name: DirectoryDecompressor
actions.description: Descomprime directorios de archivos

parameter.title: DirectoryDecompressor Parameters
parameter.description: Configures the extraction and decompression of archive files.

archiveAttributes.description: Attributes containing archive file paths to be extracted and decompressed

actions.name: Dissolver
actions.description: Disuelve polígonos adyacentes con atributos comunes

parameter.title: Dissolver Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how to dissolve features by grouping them based on shared attributes

attributeAccumulation.title: Attribute Accumulation
attributeAccumulation.description: Strategy for handling attributes when dissolving features

groupBy.title: Group By Attributes
groupBy.description: List of attribute names to group features by before dissolving. Features with the same values for these attributes will be dissolved together

tolerance.title: Tolerance
tolerance.description: Geometric tolerance. Vertices closer than this distance will be considered identical during the dissolve operation.

AttributeAccumulationStrategy.title: Attribute Accumulation Strategy
AttributeAccumulationStrategy.description: Defines how attributes should be handled when dissolving multiple features into one

oneOf.title: Drop Incoming Attributes
oneOf.description: No attributes from any incoming features will be preserved in the output (except group_by attributes if specified)

oneOf.title: Merge Incoming Attributes
oneOf.description: The output feature will merge all input attributes. When multiple features have the same attribute with different values, all values are collected into an array

oneOf.title: Use Attributes From One Feature
oneOf.description: The output inherits the attributes of one representative feature (the last feature in the group)

actions.name: EchoProcessor
actions.description: Repite las entidades

actions.name: EchoSink
actions.description: Repite las entidades

actions.name: ElevationExtractor
actions.description: Extrae el primer valor de la coordenada z de una entidad y lo almacena en un atributo.

parameter.title: Elevation Extractor Parameters
parameter.description: Configure where to store the extracted elevation value from geometry coordinates

outputAttribute.title: Output Attribute
outputAttribute.description: Name of the attribute where the extracted elevation value will be stored

actions.name: ExcelWriter
actions.description: Writes features to Microsoft Excel format (.xlsx files).

parameter.title: ExcelWriter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for writing features to Microsoft Excel format.

output.description: Output path or expression for the Excel file to create

actions.name: Extruder
actions.description: Extruye un polígono a una cierta distancia

parameter.title: Extruder Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how to extrude 2D polygons into 3D solid geometries

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: The vertical distance (height) to extrude the polygon. Can be a constant value or an expression

actions.name: FeatureCityGmlReader
actions.description: Lee características de archivos CityGML

parameter.title: FeatureCityGmlReader Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for reading and processing CityGML files as features.

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Path or expression to the CityGML dataset file to be read

flatten.title: Flatten
flatten.description: Whether to flatten the hierarchical structure of the CityGML data

actions.name: FeatureCounter
actions.description: Cuenta entidades

parameter.title: Feature Counter Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how features are counted and grouped, and where to store the count

groupBy.title: Group By Attributes
groupBy.description: List of attribute names to group features by before counting

outputAttribute.title: Output Attribute
outputAttribute.description: Name of the attribute where the count will be stored

actions.name: FeatureCreator
actions.description: Crea entidades a partir de expresiones

parameter.title: FeatureCreator Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how to generate custom features using script expressions

creator.title: Script Expression
creator.description: Write a script expression that returns a map (single feature) or array of maps (multiple features). Each map represents feature attributes as key-value pairs.

actions.name: FeatureDuplicateFilter
actions.description: Elimina características duplicadas

actions.name: FeatureFilePathExtractor
actions.description: Extrae rutas de archivo de características

parameter.title: Feature File Path Extractor Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how to extract file paths from datasets and optionally extract archives

destPrefix.title: Destination Prefix
destPrefix.description: Optional prefix to add to extracted file paths

extractArchive.title: Extract Archive
extractArchive.description: Whether to extract archive files found in the dataset

sourceDataset.title: Source Dataset
sourceDataset.description: Expression to get the source dataset path or URL

actions.name: FeatureFilter
actions.description: Filtra entidades según condiciones

parameter.title: Feature Filter Parameters
parameter.description: Configure the conditions and output ports for filtering features based on expressions

conditions.title: Filter Conditions
conditions.description: List of conditions and their corresponding output ports for routing filtered features

actions.name: FeatureLodFilter
actions.description: Filtra basado en Nivel de Detalle

parameter.title: FeatureLodFilter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for filtering features based on Level of Detail (LOD).

filterKey.description: Attribute used to group features for LOD filtering

actions.name: FeatureMerger
actions.description: Une entidades según sus atributos

parameter.title: FeatureMerger Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for merging requestor and supplier features based on matching attributes or expressions.

completeGrouped.description: Whether to complete grouped features before processing the next group

requestorAttribute.description: Attributes from requestor features to use for matching (alternative to requestor_attribute_value)

requestorAttributeValue.description: Expression to evaluate for requestor feature matching values (alternative to requestor_attribute)

supplierAttribute.description: Attributes from supplier features to use for matching (alternative to supplier_attribute_value)

supplierAttributeValue.description: Expression to evaluate for supplier feature matching values (alternative to supplier_attribute)

actions.name: FeatureReader
actions.description: Filtra entidades según condiciones

oneOf.title: Common Reader Parameters
oneOf.description: Shared configuration for all feature reader formats.

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Path or expression to the dataset file to be read

offset.description: The offset of the first row to read

oneOf.description: Shared configuration for all feature reader formats.

oneOf.description: Shared configuration for all feature reader formats.

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Path or expression to the dataset file to be read

actions.name: FeatureSorter
actions.description: Ordena entidades por atributos

parameter.title: FeatureSorter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for sorting features based on attribute values.

attributes.description: Attributes to use for sorting features (sort order based on attribute order)

actions.name: FeatureTransformer
actions.description: Transforma entidades mediante expresiones

parameter.title: FeatureTransformer Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for applying transformation expressions to features.

transformers.description: List of transformation expressions to apply to each feature

expr.description: Expression that modifies the feature (can access and modify attributes, geometry, etc.)

actions.name: FeatureTypeFilter
actions.description: Filtra entidades por tipo de entidad

parameter.title: FeatureTypeFilter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for filtering features based on their feature type.

actions.name: FeatureWriter
actions.description: Escribe características a un archivo

parameter.title: FeatureWriter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for writing features to different file formats.

oneOf.title: JsonWriter Parameters
oneOf.description: Configuration for writing features in JSON format with optional custom conversion.

actions.name: FilePathExtractor
actions.description: Extrae archivos de un directorio o de un archivo comprimido

parameter.description: Configuration for extracting file paths from directories or archives.

extractArchive.title: Extract Archive

sourceDataset.title: Source Dataset
sourceDataset.description: Path or expression pointing to the source directory or archive file

actions.name: FilePropertyExtractor
actions.description: Extrae propiedades de un archivo

parameter.title: FilePropertyExtractor Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for extracting file system properties from files.

filePathAttribute.description: Attribute name containing the file path to analyze for properties

actions.name: GeoJsonReader
actions.description: Lee características de un archivo GeoJSON

parameter.title: GeoJsonReader Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for reading GeoJSON files as geographic features.

dataset.title: File Path

inline.title: Inline Content
inline.description: Expression that returns the file content as text instead of reading from a file path

actions.name: GeoJsonWriter
actions.description: Escribe entidades en un archivo GeoJSON

parameter.title: GeoJsonWriter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for writing features to GeoJSON files.

groupBy.description: Optional attributes to group features by, creating separate files for each group

output.description: Output path or expression for the GeoJSON file to create

actions.description: Reads geographic features from GeoPackage (.gpkg) files with support for vector features, tiles, and metadata

dataset.title: File Path

inline.title: Inline Content
inline.description: Expression that returns the file content as text instead of reading from a file path

actions.name: GeometryCoercer
actions.description: Fuerza la geometría de una entidad a una geometría específica

parameter.title: GeometryCoercer Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for coercing geometries to specific target types.

targetType.description: Target geometry type to coerce features to (e.g., LineString)

actions.name: GeometryExtractor
actions.description: Extrae la geometría de una entidad y la añade como un atributo.

parameter.title: Geometry Extractor Parameters
parameter.description: Configure where to store the extracted geometry data as a compressed attribute

outputAttribute.title: Output Attribute
outputAttribute.description: Name of the attribute where the extracted geometry data will be stored as compressed JSON

actions.name: GeometryFilter
actions.description: Filtra la geometría por tipo

parameter.title: Geometry Filter Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how to filter features based on their geometry type

actions.name: GeometryPartExtractor
actions.description: Extract geometry parts (surfaces) from 3D geometries as separate features

parameter.title: Geometry Part Extractor Parameters
parameter.description: Configure which geometry parts to extract from 3D geometries

geometryPartType.title: Part Type
geometryPartType.description: Type of geometry part to extract

oneOf.description: Extract surfaces as separate features

actions.name: GeometryReplacer
actions.description: Reemplaza la geometría de una entidad con una nueva geometría.

parameter.title: Geometry Replacer Parameters
parameter.description: Configure which attribute contains the geometry data to replace the feature's current geometry

sourceAttribute.title: Source Attribute
sourceAttribute.description: Name of the attribute containing the compressed geometry data to use as the new geometry

actions.name: GeometrySplitter
actions.description: Divide la geometría por tipo

actions.name: GeometryValidator
actions.description: Valida la geometría de una entidad

parameter.title: Geometry Validator Parameters
parameter.description: Configure which validation checks to perform on feature geometries

validationTypes.title: Validation Types
validationTypes.description: List of validation checks to perform on the geometry (duplicate points, corrupt geometry, self-intersection)

actions.name: GeometryValueFilter
actions.description: Filtra la geometría por valor

actions.name: GltfReader
actions.description: Reads 3D models from glTF 2.0 files, supporting meshes, nodes, scenes, and geometry primitives

dataset.title: File Path
dataset.description: Expression that returns the path to the input file (e.g., "data.csv" or variable reference)

includeNodes.title: Include Nodes
includeNodes.description: If true, includes node hierarchy information from the glTF scene graph in feature attributes

inline.title: Inline Content
inline.description: Expression that returns the file content as text instead of reading from a file path

mergeMeshes.title: Merge Meshes
mergeMeshes.description: If true, combines all meshes from the glTF file into a single output feature

triangulate.title: Triangulate
triangulate.description: If true, converts all primitives to triangles (reserved for future use - currently all primitives are processed as triangles)

actions.name: GltfWriter
actions.description: Escribe entidades en un archivo Gltf

parameter.title: GltfWriter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for writing features to GLTF 3D format.

attachTexture.description: Whether to attach texture information to the GLTF model

output.description: Output path or expression for the GLTF file to create

actions.name: HoleCounter
actions.description: Cuenta el número de huecos en una geometría y lo agrega como atributo.

parameter.title: Hole Counter Parameters
parameter.description: Configure where to store the count of holes found in polygon geometries

outputAttribute.title: Output Attribute
outputAttribute.description: Name of the attribute where the hole count will be stored as a number

actions.name: HoleExtractor
actions.description: Extrae los huecos en una geometría y los agrega como atributo.

actions.name: HorizontalReprojector
actions.description: Reproyecta la geometría de una entidad a un sistema de coordenadas especificado

parameter.title: Horizontal Reprojector Parameters
parameter.description: Configure the source and target coordinate systems for geometry reprojection

sourceEpsgCode.title: Source EPSG Code
sourceEpsgCode.description: Source coordinate system EPSG code. If not provided, will use the EPSG code from the geometry. This is optional to maintain backward compatibility but recommended to be explicit.

targetEpsgCode.title: Target EPSG Code
targetEpsgCode.description: Target coordinate system EPSG code for the reprojection. Supports any valid EPSG code (e.g., 4326 for WGS84, 2193 for NZTM2000, 3857 for Web Mercator).

actions.name: InputRouter
actions.description: Acción para el reenvío del primer puerto en sub-flujos de trabajo.

actions.name: JPStandardGridAccumulator
actions.description: Acumula características en la cuadrícula estándar japonesa

actions.name: JsonReader
actions.description: Reads features from JSON files, supporting both single objects and arrays of objects.

parameter.title: JsonReader Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for reading JSON files as features.

dataset.title: File Path
dataset.description: Expression that returns the path to the input file (e.g., "data.csv" or variable reference)

inline.title: Inline Content
inline.description: Expression that returns the file content as text instead of reading from a file path

actions.name: JsonWriter
actions.description: Writes features to JSON files.

parameter.title: JsonWriter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for writing features to JSON files.

converter.description: Optional converter expression to transform features before writing

output.description: Output path or expression for the JSON file to create

actions.name: LineOnLineOverlayer
actions.description: Los puntos de intersección se convierten en entidades de puntos que pueden contener la lista combinada de atributos de las líneas originales intersectadas.

parameter.title: LineOnLineOverlayer Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for finding intersection points between line features.

overlaidListsAttrName.description: Name of the attribute to store the overlaid lists. Defaults to "overlaidLists".

actions.name: ListConcatenator
actions.description: Extracts a specific attribute from each element in a list and concatenates them into a single string

parameter.title: ListConcatenator Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for concatenating a specific attribute from list elements.

attribute.description: Attribute name to extract from each list element

outputAttributeName.description: Name of the attribute to store the concatenated result

separateCharacter.description: Character(s) to use as separator between concatenated values

actions.name: ListExploder
actions.description: Divide en varios elementos los atributos de tipo lista

parameter.title: ListExploder Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for exploding array attributes into individual features.

sourceAttribute.description: Attribute containing the array to explode (each element becomes a separate feature)

actions.name: ListIndexer
actions.description: Copies attributes from a specific list element to become the main attributes of a feature

parameter.title: ListIndexer Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for copying attributes from a specific list element to main feature attributes.

copiedAttributePrefix.description: Optional prefix to add to copied attribute names

copiedAttributeSuffix.description: Optional suffix to add to copied attribute names

listIndexToCopy.description: Index of the list element to copy (0-based)

actions.name: ObjReader
actions.description: Reads 3D models from Wavefront OBJ files, supporting vertices, faces, normals, texture coordinates, and materials

parameter.title: ObjReader Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for reading Wavefront OBJ 3D model files with support for vertices, faces, normals, texture coordinates, and material definitions.

dataset.title: File Path
dataset.description: Expression that returns the path to the input file (e.g., "data.csv" or variable reference)

includeNormals.title: Include Normals
includeNormals.description: Include vertex normal data in the output geometry

includeTexcoords.title: Include Texture Coordinates
includeTexcoords.description: Include texture coordinate (UV) data in the output geometry

inline.title: Inline Content
inline.description: Expression that returns the file content as text instead of reading from a file path

materialFile.title: Material File
materialFile.description: Expression that returns the path to an external MTL file to use instead of mtllib directives in the OBJ file. When specified, this overrides any material library references in the OBJ file.

mergeGroups.title: Merge Groups
mergeGroups.description: Merge all groups and objects into a single feature instead of creating separate features per group/object

parseMaterials.title: Parse Materials
parseMaterials.description: Enable parsing of material definitions from MTL files referenced in the OBJ file

triangulate.title: Triangulate
triangulate.description: Convert polygons with more than 3 vertices into triangles using fan triangulation

writeMaterials.title: Write Materials
writeMaterials.description: Enable writing of material (MTL) file alongside the OBJ file

writeNormals.title: Write Normals
writeNormals.description: Include vertex normal vectors in the output

writeTexcoords.title: Write Texture Coordinates
writeTexcoords.description: Include texture coordinate (UV) data in the output (currently not supported - geometry types don't include UV data)

parameter.description: Configure unshared edge detection behavior

tolerance.description: Tolerance for edge matching in meters (default: 0.1) Edges within this distance are considered the same edge

actions.name: ShapefileReader
actions.description: Reads geographic features from Shapefile archives (.zip containing .shp, .dbf, .shx files)

parameter.title: ShapefileReader Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for reading Shapefile archives as geographic features. Expects a ZIP archive containing the required Shapefile components (.shp, .dbf, .shx).

dataset.title: File Path
dataset.description: Expression that returns the path to the input file (e.g., "data.csv" or variable reference)

encoding.title: Character Encoding
encoding.description:
Character encoding for attribute data in the DBF file. If not specified, encoding is determined from the .cpg file (if present), otherwise defaults to UTF-8.

Supported encodings include: - **UTF-8** - Unicode UTF-8 (default, recommended for all new shapefiles) - **Windows Code Pages** - Windows-1250 through Windows-1258, Windows-874 - **ISO-8859 family** - ISO-8859-1 (Latin-1) through ISO-8859-16 - **Asian encodings** - Shift-JIS, EUC-JP, EUC-KR, Big5, GBK, GB18030 - **Other legacy encodings** - KOI8-R, KOI8-U, IBM866, Macintosh

All encoding labels are case-insensitive and support common variations (e.g., "UTF-8", "UTF8", "utf8" all work).

UTF-16 is not supported due to byte-level handling requirements. If a UTF-16 shapefile is encountered, an error with conversion instructions is returned.

Examples: - `"UTF-8"` - Modern standard - `"Windows-1252"` - Common for Western European legacy data - `"ISO-8859-1"` - Latin-1, common in older shapefiles - `"Shift-JIS"` - Japanese data

Priority order: encoding parameter > .cpg file > UTF-8 default

force2d.title: Force 2D
force2d.description: If true, forces all geometries to be 2D (ignoring Z values)

inline.title: Inline Content
inline.description: Expression that returns the file content as text instead of reading from a file path

actions.name: ShapefileWriter
actions.description: Escribe características a un Shapefile

parameter.title: ShapefileWriter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for writing features to ESRI Shapefile format.

groupBy.description: Optional attributes to group features by, creating separate files for each group

output.description: Output path or expression for the Shapefile to create

actions.name: SolidBoundaryValidator

actions.name: SpatialFilter
actions.description: Filter Features by Spatial Relationship

parameter.title: SpatialFilter Parameters
parameter.description: Configure spatial relationship testing between filter and candidate geometries

outputMatchCountAttribute.title: Output Match Count Attribute
outputMatchCountAttribute.description: Optional attribute name to store the number of matching filters

passOnMultipleMatches.title: Pass on Multiple Matches
passOnMultipleMatches.description: If true, pass if ANY filter matches (OR logic). If false, pass only if ALL filters match (AND logic).

predicate.title: Spatial Predicate
predicate.description: The spatial relationship to test between filter and candidate geometries

oneOf.description: Filter geometry completely contains candidate
Candidate completely within filter geometry
Geometries have any intersection
Geometries have no spatial relationship
Geometries touch at boundaries but don't overlap
Geometries cross each other
Geometries overlap partially
Candidate is covered by filter geometry
Filter geometry covers candidate
